title: Smart Savings
description: From piggy banks to actual banks, there are many ways to save money and a variety of benefits for each method of saving. Smart Savings provides students a look at why they might want to save money and different ways to do so. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine cause-and-effect relationships and to identify and use conjunctions.
meta: allowance, balance, insurance, interest, purchase, savings account
